targets.expr: (sum(sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*USDC$", server="${server}"}) + sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*ETH$", server="${server}"}) * avg(connext_ETH_price{server="${server}"}) ) - min(sum(sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*USDC$", server="${server}"} offset ${__range}) + sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*ETH$", server="${server}"} offset ${__range}) * avg(connext_ETH_price{server="${server}"}))))/${__range_s}*86400*365/sum(sum(connext_router_liquidity{asset=~".*USDC$", server="${server}"}) + sum(connext_router_liquidity{asset=~".*ETH$", server="${server}"})*avg(connext_ETH_price{server="${server}"}))*100

sum(sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*USDC$", server="${server}"}) + sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*ETH$", server="${server}"}) * avg(connext_ETH_price{server="${server}"}) ) - min(sum(sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*USDC$", server="${server}"} offset ${__range}) + sum(connext_router_fees_earned{asset=~".*ETH$", server="${server}"} offset ${__range}) * avg(connext_ETH_price{server="${server}"}) ))
